alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 11:36AM CDT until March 22 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MADISON PARISH...CENTRAL WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES... At 1136 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fitler to near Redwood to Le Tourneau, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Redwood around 1145 AM CDT. Bovina around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Delta. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
